sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import NavbarNew from "../components/common/NavbarNew"; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "", }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission console.log("Form submitted:", formData); }; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Contact Us

Have a question? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

{/* Contact Information */}

Phone

+1 (555) 123-4567

Mon-Fri 9am-6pm

Email

support@schoollms.com

info@schoollms.com

Address

123 Education Street

New York, NY 10001

Follow Us

{/* Contact Form */}

Send us a Message

{/* Map or Additional Info */}

Office Hours

Monday - Friday

9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Saturday - Sunday

10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

); }; export default Contact;
